Chat.WriteYourMessageHere: Write your message here and press enter.
Chat.NotAvailable: Sorry, we're not online at the moment. Leave a message and we'll get back to you.
Chat.Name: Name
Chat.ThanksForInstall: Thank you for installing this Chat plugin for Piwik !
Chat.EndInstallWhatToDo: Ensure that this code is on every pages of your website, after the Piwik's tracking code and before the </body> tag.
Chat.HowToUseDesc: The VisitorProfile popup has been modified by the plugin, in order for you to chat directly with your customers, through the new Chat tab.
Chat.CloseAndNeverOpenAgain: Close this popup and never open it again
